summary: As an awkward idealistic high school teacher begins her first job in the city, things turn out to be much tougher than she had imagined.
cast: Eva Löbau|Daniela Holtz|Jan Neumann|Ilona Schulz|Robert Schupp|Heinz Röser-Dümmig|Martina Eckrich|Nina Fiedler|Hans-Rüdiger Kucich|Ruth Köppler|Achim Enchelmaier|Monika Hirschle|Volker Jeck|Hans-Peter Gastiger|Andreas Bornhardt|Violetta Breuer|Siegfried Schneider
title: Der Wald vor lauter Bäumen
